did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult Special Collections & Archives staff.
did.abstract: During the 1980s, a Wesleyan faculty member was asked to deliver an address to the incoming freshman class each year. These addesses contained advice and wisdom about the students' upcoming lives at Wesleyan University. These addresses were transcribed and printed by Wesleyan.
These addresses were made to incoming students at the beginning of the academic year throughout the 1980s.
